SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT t.`TABLE_NAME`,t.`TABLE_ROWS`,t.`TABLE_COMMENT`,GROUP_CONCAT(c.`COLUMN_NAME`) AS COLUMNS FROM `information_schema`.`TABLES` t JOIN `information_schema`.`COLUMNS` c ON c.`TABLE_NAME`=t.`TABLE_NAME` <%= AND c.`TABLE_SCHEMA`=@@DBName@@ %> WHERE 1=1 <%= AND t.`TABLE_SCHEMA`=@@DBName@@%> <%= AND t.`TABLE_NAME` = @@TableName@@%> <%= AND c.`COLUMN_NAME` = @@ColumnName@@%> GROUP BY t.TABLE_NAME;

SELECT c.`COLUMN_NAME`,c.`COLUMN_COMMENT`,c.`ORDINAL_POSITION`,c.`COLUMN_KEY`,c.`COLUMN_TYPE`,c.`DATA_TYPE` FROM `information_schema`.`COLUMNS` c WHERE c.`TABLE_SCHEMA`=@@DBName@@ <%= AND c.`TABLE_NAME` = @@TableName@@%> ORDER BY c.`ORDINAL_POSITION`;
